@Rune_Classic wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:2, topic:329590”]Like I said before, this script came from the land of faerytales and unicorns.
I would suggest you learn some Java before you attempt to make a script like that. The script you have made now will do absolutely nothing, except cause a bunch of errors.[/quote]

item.title: Were would I put this script?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Classic Rune Classic
item.description:
@Rune_Classic wrote:

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(717, 1);
talk(“Wake up!”, 1);
OptionText: Ok
OptionText: Nah I’m tiredd
If PlayerHandler Right = Ok Return GFX = 22.
If PlayerHandler Right = Nah Return GFX = 191.

What it’s supposed to do is when you first create a new account, the screen will be black and a guy says wakeup! (in NPCX Dyelog) then it will ask wake up or dont. If you choose yes, the screen will slowly fade in to the game. Were would i put this script? It’s for allstar. Also, If anything is wrong with this script, please fix.

Read full topic
item.source: Were would I put this script?
